subject: Re: [Request received] Oncobeta - URGENT, navigation missing / hidden on the site
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below: https://support.combinate.me/requests/30447/satisfaction/new/cggoaaoTgoLlShAwi6D32aWAo?locale=1176 Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 5 Jun 2025, 17:21 GMT+10 Thanks for the explanation, Joel! We can now close our ticket. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 5 Jun 2025, 10:02 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, I hope you're doing well In this case, yes - the styling issue was caused by the site theme or plugin CSS, which is why the header menu wasn't displaying correctly. We tried resetting the CSS and clearing the cache, but unfortunately that didn't resolve it () - so we addressed it by overriding the style directly. Thanks, Joel Maligalig support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2959191275-155630#}

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30447) has been solved. To reopen this request, reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30447 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 5 Jun 2025, 17:21 GMT+10 Thanks for the explanation, Joel! We can now close our ticket. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 5 Jun 2025, 10:02 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, I hope you're doing well In this case, yes - the styling issue was caused by the site theme or plugin CSS, which is why the header menu wasn't displaying correctly. We tried resetting the CSS and clearing the cache, but unfortunately that didn't resolve it () - so we addressed it by overriding the style directly. Thanks, Joel Maligalig support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2959191275-155630#}

Hi Alyssa,

I hope you're doing well

In this case, yes – the styling issue was caused by the site theme or plugin CSS, which is why the header menu wasn’t displaying correctly. We tried resetting the CSS and clearing the cache, but unfortunately that didn’t resolve it () – so we addressed it by overriding the style directly.

Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30447 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 4 Jun 2025, 17:40 GMT+10 Hi Joel, Will we be charged for the 15 minutes used to fix the styling issue, since it wasn't something caused from our end? Let us know, thanks! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 4 Jun 2025, 14:33 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Sure, there is style that is overriding the visibility, so we have update this. Sure, there is style that is overriding the visibility, so we have update this.

Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

4 Jun 2025, 10:13 GMT+10

Hi team,

Good morning! Another urgent one here.

While checking the Education pages, we noticed that the main menu is missing/whited out:


If you hover over them, you can see the menu that opens, but otherwise they're not visible.

Can we rectify ASAP, please?

Regards,
Alyssa
